TempStable 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • my-vignette
  • Changelog

    Function to generate random variates of the TSS distribution.

    rTSS.Rd

    Generates n random numbers distributed according of the tempered stable subordinator distribution.

    rTSS(
  n,
  alpha = NULL,
  delta = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  theta = NULL,
  method = "AR",
  k = 10000
)

    Arguments

    n

    sample size (integer).

    alpha

    Stability parameter. A real number between 0 and 1.

    delta

    Scale parameter. A real number > 0.

    lambda

    Tempering parameter. A real number > 0.

    theta

    Parameters stacked as a vector.

    method

    A String. Either "AR" or "SR".

    k

    integer: the level of truncation, if method == "SR". 10000 by default.

    Value

    Generates n random numbers.

    Details

    theta denotes the parameter vector (alpha, delta, lambda). Either provide the parameters alpha, delta, lambda individually OR provide theta. "AR" stands for the Acceptance-Rejection Method and "SR" for a truncated infinite shot noise series representation. "AR" is the standard method used. For more details, see references.

    References

    Massing, Till (2022), 'Parametric Estimation of Tempered Stable Laws'

    Kawai, R & Masuda, H (2011), 'On simulation of tempered stable random variates' doi:10.1016/j.cam.2010.12.014

    Examples

    rTSS(100,0.5,1,1)
#>   [1] 0.7674872 1.3251228 1.5011183 1.7542180 1.3406815 2.1705807 1.5098717
#>   [8] 2.5734378 1.5511887 2.7309537 1.0350581 1.2633839 0.6566517 1.8806165
#>  [15] 2.4303999 2.7471592 0.7707577 0.9960180 2.3364160 2.0462932 1.2887779
#>  [22] 1.0342739 1.3720934 2.6804174 2.7673433 2.9282486 1.3406192 1.3402843
#>  [29] 1.4365320 4.0783912 2.5025827 1.0766357 2.8183933 0.9550123 0.9800882
#>  [36] 0.5816445 1.1379278 1.5028419 1.8728362 1.6594030 0.8033085 2.3519859
#>  [43] 1.9870032 1.7313393 2.1124042 3.1956909 1.3492145 1.3437102 0.8941245
#>  [50] 2.1209109 1.6818960 4.7016194 1.0619268 5.3118856 3.4999192 1.2608821
#>  [57] 3.4371566 2.2254751 0.9299289 2.2629244 1.0245610 1.6389268 1.7746803
#>  [64] 1.2320861 1.9299789 0.9596407 1.0065697 2.5909440 2.4679468 1.4199776
#>  [71] 0.7386574 2.2433744 0.9123078 1.2314420 0.9673643 1.0999966 1.2821880

#>  [85] 1.5578330 1.5931640 1.3579888 1.5072300 0.7359489 1.4918514 1.3625995
#>  [92] 1.5528022 1.9544686 1.0321650 1.0754197 2.0392129 1.1162524 1.4185352
#>  [99] 1.6287621 0.9446775
